attributes.additional_details:
We should stop, immediately, the foreign aid sent to countries whose population is living in squalor and foraging from refuse tips for food with children starving to death whilst their government spend millions of Pounds on nuclear weapons and entering the space race. Help us to help them see the folly of their ways. The amount of money spent on foreign aid is a disgrace and would help the plight of our own countrymen immeasurably.
Sign this petition to get the government to listen to people sense.
